column4: Hey guys, I am wanting to revert back to Firefox 2.0.014 after doing the Hardy Heron upgrade. Any help, as I am unable to do so
there's a package for firefox 2. check synaptic
still having trouble with extensions? did you try that extension i mentioned?
was a while ago. you acknowledged it
makes firefox think your extensions are compatible. but i recommend enabling them one at a time
'cause some will work, and some won't, and some may prevent it from running
if you end up enabling a bad one that prevents it from running, then run an older firefox to fix it
the nightly tester tools? of course ;)
a 'nightly' is a cutting edge build, released every day. it's an extension designed to enable extensions for testing on versions of firefox they aren't designed for
i had a weird issue like that the first time i tried to use the nightly exension. try restarting it, and make sure you select an extension, then right click and 'make compatible'
um, i thought you were trying to enable FF2 extensions for FF3?
nightly tester tools alters the extensions compatibility. ff2 thinks they don't work anymore. you'll prolly have to reinstall them if you want to go back..
however... Nightly isn't showing up on the extensions list.
huh... well i've never downgraded like that, so...
